Sports trousers in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

CONSCIOUS. 5-pocket washed denim jeans in a relaxed fit with a regular waist and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Warm-lined hat in woven fabric with ears at the top, earflaps and a strap with a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Soft faux fur lining.

Mittens in woven fabric with narrow elastication at the wrists and a faux fur trim at the top. Size 2-6M without thumbs. Fleece lining.

Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline, concealed button placket and ties at the top. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Fitted, knee-length dress in sturdy jersey with short cap sleeves and a decorative buckle at the front of the waist. Zip at the back and a short slit at the hem. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in a soft jacquard knit with a soft faux fur pompom on top and a small fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.

Hooded jacket in soft pile with a small fabric appliqué on the front, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Set in a soft, fine knit with mittens and a jacquard-patterned hat and blanket. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Hat with a pompom on top and ribbed hem. Blanket with ribbed edges. Size of blanket 65x65 cm. The set is supplied in a gift box with a satin ribbon.

Jacket in soft, patterned pile with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard and an imitation leather tab. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, side pockets and taped trims around the pockets and hem. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a raw-edge hem.
Short top in smocked cotton jersey with broderie anglaise. Square neckline, long puff sleeves and overlocked edges.
Short top in smocked cotton jersey with broderie anglaise. Square neckline, long puff sleeves and overlocked edges.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit, fluffy yarn with patch front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit, fluffy yarn with patch front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit, fluffy yarn with patch front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft satin with a strappy top and bottoms. Top with a V-neck, lace trims at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
